definition: variant of 憤怒|愤怒[fen4 nu4]

sentences.english: That of course raised my ire.
sentences.chinese: 这当然也引起我的忿怒。

sentences.english: Christ expiated the sins and propitiated the divine wrath for all his people.
sentences.chinese: 基督替祂的子民赎了他们的罪，并且挽回了神的忿怒。

sentences.english: But it was uprooted in fury and thrown to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 但这葡萄树因忿怒被拔出摔在地上。

sentences.english: Because of their guilt, God's anger came upon Judah and Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 因他们这罪，就有忿怒临到犹大和耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: I watched his reaction warily , expecting more of the fury I'd seen at his house.
sentences.chinese: 我谨慎地看着他的反应，期待着更多的忿怒。

sentences.english: She tried to dissemble her anger with a smile on her face.
sentences.chinese: 她试着用在她的脸上一个微笑掩饰她的忿怒。

sentences.english: You set aside all your wrath and turned from your fierce anger.
sentences.chinese: 你收转了所发的忿怒，和你猛烈的怒气。

sentences.english: For the great day of his wrath is come; and who shall be able to stand?
sentences.chinese: 因为他们忿怒的大日到了，谁能站得住呢。

sentences.english: His eyes shall see his destruction, and he shall drink of the wrath of the Almighty.
sentences.chinese: 愿他亲眼看见自己败亡，亲自饮全能者的忿怒。

sentences.english: Thou hast taken away all thy wrath: thou hast turned thyself from the fierceness of thine anger.
sentences.chinese: 你收回了你的一切忿怒，使你猛烈的怒气转消。

sentences.english: The increase of his house shall depart, and his goods shall flow away in the day of his wrath.
sentences.chinese: 他的家产必被掠去，在神忿怒的日子被冲走。

sentences.english: For the great day of their wrath has come, and who can stand?
sentences.chinese: 因为他们忿怒的大日到了，谁能站得住呢？

sentences.english: But you bring more wrath upon Israel by profaning the Sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 现在你们还渎犯安息日，使神的忿怒越发临到以色列。

sentences.english: yet ye bring more wrath upon Israel by profaning the sabbath.
sentences.chinese: 现在你们还犯安息日，使忿怒越发临到以色列。

sentences.english: The desire of the righteous ends only in good, but the hope of the wicked only in wrath.
sentences.chinese: 义人的心愿，尽得好处，恶人的指望，致干忿怒。

sentences.english: With great rage, the farmer reloads his shotgun and blows away the pigs.
sentences.chinese: 由于巨大的忿怒，农场主再装填他的猎枪并且开了枪。

definition: variant of 憤恨|愤恨[fen4 hen4]
to hate and resent/angry and full of grievances
